Params: {3: "A thug laying on the ground suddenly grabs Changyu by the ankle, preventing him from leaving. Seeing this, the thug's cohorts rush toward Changyu, and the brawl continues."}
{3: 'In the distance, the enthralling and booming voices of the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce can be vaguely heard as if giving an inspiring speech.'}
{2: 'KCC Leader', 3: '"...The cities fall, one by one. But why are we still standing?"'}
{2: 'KCC Leader', 3: '"Because countless brave warriors fought for Kowloong. It is the will of Kowloong that they bear. They fight against the virus, they prove to the world..."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Don't think you can strong-arm me and get away with it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'KCC Leader', 3: '"We bear the same pride. We hold the same beliefs."'}
{2: 'KCC Leader', 3: 'Kowloong is a crystal, nucleated from history. Kowloongers do not fear war, because war cannot break the will of Kowloong.'}
{3: 'The sound gradually fades in the distance. The sound of fighting and shouting drowns out the broadcast.'}
{3: 'Life has already been so difficult for everyone.'}
{3: 'You think this "will of Kowloong" can return our theater—our lives—back to normal?'}
